thread.section_title: Teleflora Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Teleflora | www.teleflora.com
thread.title: Mad

author: Mad
title: Mad
text: Chose this god forsaken company to deliver my sick mother some flowers, upon delivery I was mortified and embarrassed. Not as pictured...by far. I upgraded to he premium bouquet...NEVER DO THIS. This is a scam. The company sent a very basic bouquet, with the wrong flowers, that my 4 year old cousin could have grown together. Think twice before flushing your hard earned money down the toilet.
